name: Find the Cheapest Flights Automatically with Bright Data & n8n

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

If you need any help with Automations, feel free to reach out via linkedin:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/

And check out my Youtube channel:

description:
# 

## Description

This workflow automatically searches multiple flight booking websites to find the cheapest flights for your desired routes. It leverages web scraping to compare prices across platforms, helping you save money on air travel.

## Overview

This workflow automatically searches multiple flight booking websites to find the cheapest flights for your desired routes. It uses Bright Data to scrape flight prices and can notify you when prices drop below your target threshold.

### Tools Used

*   **n8n:** The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow.
*   **Bright Data:** For scraping flight prices from booking websites.
*   **Notification Services:** Email, SMS, or other messaging platforms.

## How to Install

1.  **Import the Workflow:** Download the `.json` file and import it into your n8n instance.
2.  **Configure Bright Data:** Add your Bright Data credentials to the Bright Data node.
3.  **Set Up Notifications:** Configure your preferred notification method.
4.  **Customize:** Set your routes, date ranges, and price thresholds.

## Use Cases

*   **Frequent Travelers:** Find the best deals for your regular routes.
*   **Travel Agencies:** Monitor flight prices for client bookings.
*   **Budget Travelers:** Get notified when flights to your dream destination become affordable.

---

## Connect with Me

*   **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Get Bright Data:** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üß≥ ‚úàÔ∏è **Flight Price Scraper from Skiplagged using Bright Data**

This automation helps you extract **cheap flight prices** from [Skiplagged.com](https://skiplagged.com) using **Bright Data** and automatically logs those prices into a **Google Sheet** for review and tracking.

---

## üîπ **SECTION 1: Getting the Flight Prices**

*Combining: Manual Trigger + HTTP Request (Bright Data)*

### üå©Ô∏è 1. **Manual Trigger**

* **üß† What it does**: Starts the workflow when you click **Execute Workflow** in n8n.
* **üë®‚Äçüè´ For beginners**: Think of it like a **start button**. No schedule, just run it manually whenever you want to check for deals.

---

### üåê 2. **Fetch Flight Details from Skiplagged via Bright Data**

* **üîß Node Type**: `HTTP Request` (POST)

* **üåç What's happening**:

  * Uses Bright Data Web Unlocker to **bypass bot protection** and fetch HTML content from Skiplagged.
  * You‚Äôre sending a POST request to `https://api.brightdata.com/request`, asking Bright Data to open:
    `https://skiplagged.com/flights/DUB/LON/2024-06-30` (or a dynamic route).
  * Headers & proxy make it **look like a real browser**.

* **üí° Why it‚Äôs useful**:

  * **Skiplagged is tricky to scrape** directly, but Bright Data makes it easy.
  * You get the **entire HTML** of the search results page, ready to extract price info.

* ‚úÖ **Returns**: HTML of the page (not yet structured ‚Äî we handle that next)

---

## üîπ **SECTION 2: Extracting & Storing Flight Prices**

*Combining: HTML Node + Google Sheets*

### üñ•Ô∏è 3. **HTML Extract (extractHtmlContent)**

* **üîß Node Type**: `HTML Extract`

* **üéØ Goal**: Pull out **all flight prices** from the raw HTML.

* **How it works**:

  * Uses a selector like `.flights-landing__flight-price` to find every element that matches.
  * **Returns multiple values** if "Return All Matches" is enabled.

* üß† **Beginner Note**: Imagine your browser looking for all `<div class="flights-landing__flight-price">`. This is like **copying all price tags off the screen**.

* ‚úÖ **Returns**:

  ```json
  [
    "$104", "$117", "$99", "$88"
  ]
  ```

---

### üìä 4. **Google Sheets (append: sheet)**

* **üîß Node Type**: `Google Sheets Append`

* **üìã What it does**: Appends each flight price as a new row in your spreadsheet.

* **üõ†Ô∏è Tip**: Make sure your sheet has one column titled something like `Price` and authentication is set up.

* ‚ùå **Error Warning**: If this node is red, likely issues are:

  * Missing Google credentials
  * Sheet name doesn‚Äôt match
  * Field mapping mismatch

* ‚úÖ **Returns**: New rows in your sheet like:

| Price |
| ----- |
| \$88  |
| \$99  |
| \$104 |

---

## üåü Final Thoughts: Why This Is Powerful

‚úÖ **Perfect for spontaneous travelers** who want to grab last-minute deals.
‚úÖ **Low-cost** thanks to free tools (n8n + Google Sheets) and flexible Bright Data usage.
‚úÖ **Easy to expand**: Add logic to filter cheapest flight, add Telegram/email alert, or schedule it daily.

---

## üß≠ Next Steps You Could Add

* üìÖ Add a **Cron node** to automate daily checks.
* üì¨ Add **Telegram or Email node** to notify when price < \$100.
* üîß Use **Set node** to make route and date dynamic.

---
